@kef71

Do all of the seasons have black bars and artifacts at the sides, or just some of them?

I assume this is due to the fact that not long ago CRT based TVs typically didn't display the outer edges of the video feed, and so when production companies would edit video destined for television distribution they would often just ignore any artifacts at the outer edges.  I know video editors changed their habits years ago, so I'm just curious if it was before or after the end of this series.

Anyways, I'm trying to work out my cropping and resizing numbers, before I begin re-encoding these, so that I can maintain consistency across all of the seasons.

Thanks again!
